plot: Charlotte's desire to grow up is so overshadowed by her fear of change that only a natural, physical transformation can force her into adulthood.
title: Swim
plot_es: Charlotte's desire to grow up is so overshadowed by her fear of change that only a natural, physical transformation can force her into adulthood.
plot_en: Charlotte's desire to grow up is so overshadowed by her fear of change that only a natural, physical transformation can force her into adulthood.
